issue.title: ARROW-6917: [Archery][Release] Add support for JIRA curation, changelog generation and commit cherry-picking for maintenance releases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6917](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6917). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For 0.14.1, I maintained this script by hand. It would be less failure-prone (maybe) to generate it based on the fix versions set in JIRA

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6917?focusedCommentId=16960668) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Here is an implementation https://gist.github.com/kszucs/b2743546044ccd3215e5bb34fa0d76a0

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6917?focusedCommentId=17010202) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Do we want to add this to the repo?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6917?focusedCommentId=17057329) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Sure, including another variant which checks that jiras belonging to the the merged patches since the latest release have appropiate version number and components set. This would help with the jira tidying.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6917?focusedCommentId=17134946) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I moved this out of 1.0.0 since it is a non-blocker
